reviews.review_msg: I took Sonja's religion course because I liked her teaching in SA 356. She's a very nice prof! I accidentally uploaded a wrong file and she emailed me saying that I had and she did not take marks off! Her marking is not too harsh. She makes her lecture content interesting!

religion and society class was very interesting and the books we were required to read were also good. She was very good sometimes class would get a little dull but other than that it was a pretty easy class i would say
